medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports abdominal pain since last night, initially generalized that localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) late last evening. Pain is sharp, constant, and non-radiating, with associated nausea and anorexia since last night. Reports subjective fevers at home. Denies changes in bowel habits, dysuria, jaundice, or recent weight loss.
